So I am here today to wait with you all.

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2013 12:17PM velle wrote: Thanks for all the well wishes. Surgery went well. Spent 2 nights in the hospital and I am back at home in bed. Honestly, I haven't looked at my breasts yet. I'm afraid to for some reason. Things feel so tight on me right now (Lat Flap on the left, reduction and lift on the right). All the nurses that have looked at me say they look great. Percocet has been a great help.
